      • hireAnEmployee

        public void hireAnEmployee(java.lang.String employeeName,
                           java.lang.String employeeID,
                           int employeeSalary,
                           int playerTShirtNumber,
                           int playerGoalsScored,
                           double playerAverageRating,
                           int playerPositionIndicator)
        Hires a player
        pre:
        post: A player is hired
        Parameters:
        employeeName - String that indicates the name of the player
        employeeID - String that indicates the identifier of the player
        employeeSalary - int that indicates the salary of the player
        playerTShirtNumber - int that indicates the t-shirt number of the player
        playerGoalsScored - int that indicates the goals scored by the player
        playerAverageRating - double that indicates the average rating of the player. Must be a number from 1 to 5.
        playerPositionIndicator - int that indicates the position of the player. 1 for GoalKeeper, 2 for Defender,3 for midfielder, 4 for striker.

      • hireAnEmployee

        public void hireAnEmployee(java.lang.String employeeName,
                           java.lang.String employeeID,
                           int employeeSalary,
                           int experienceYears,
                           int teamsInCharge,
                           int championshipsAchieved)
        Hires a head coach
        pre:
        post: A head coach is hired
        Parameters:
        employeeName - String that indicates the name of the player
        employeeID - String that indicates the identifier of the player
        employeeSalary - int that indicates the salary of the player
        experienceYears - int that indicates the years of experience of the head coach
        teamsInCharge - int that indicates the number of teams the head coach has in charge
        championshipsAchieved - int that indicates the number of championships achieved by the head coach

      • hireAnEmployee

        public void hireAnEmployee(java.lang.String employeeName,
                           java.lang.String employeeID,
                           int employeeSalary,
                           int experienceYears,
                           boolean wasAPlayer,
                           int expertiseIndicator)
        Hires an assistant coach
        pre:
        post: An assistant coach is hired
        Parameters:
        employeeName - String that indicates the name of the player
        employeeID - String that indicates the identifier of the player
        employeeSalary - int that indicates the salary of the player
        experienceYears - int that indicates the years of experience of the head coach
        wasAPlayer - boolean that indicates if the coach was a proffesional player or not
        expertiseIndicator - int that indicates the expertise of the coach. 1 for offensive, 2 for deffensive, 3 for possesion, 4 for lab plays

      • findEmployee

        public int findEmployee(java.lang.String employeeName)
        Finds an employee int the club
        pre: It is only useful if there is at least one employee in the club.
        post: Returns an int, if it is "-1" then the employee doesn't exist. If is another number, indicates the position in which the employee is
        Parameters:
        employeeName - String that indicates the name of the employee
        Returns:
        index

      • fireAnEmployee

        public boolean fireAnEmployee(int index)
        Given an index, changes the state of an employee to inactive
        pre: Don't fire an employee that is already fired
        post: fires an employee
        Parameters:
        index - int that indicates what employee do you want to fire.
        Returns:
        true or false

        public int employeeInstanceOf(int index)
